title: Alkaline Juicing: Supercharge Your Body & Mind, Speed Up Natural Weight Loss, and Enjoy Vibrant Energy (Alkaline Lifestyle Book 4)
features: Discover How to Energize Your Body and Mind with Alkaline Juicing
Over 30, healthy juice recipes + holistic wellness tips to boost your wellbeing by bringing your body back into balance.

For those of you spending a lot of money at McDonalds or at the Kangaroo gas mart on coffee like I do, you need to read this book! In the words of the author, "Juice is the best natural coffee." I am in the process of losing weight and I am thankful to have this book as a guideline. Let Marta explain to you how juicing can change YOUR life! Great book! –
by Amazon Customer, US
Here's what you will discover inside:
-The most common misconception about the alkaline diet and what you should be focusing on instead
-Supposedly healthy superfoods that should never be juiced
-The best
alkaline superfoods for massive energy
(you can easily find them in your local grocery store)
-The surprising truth about most fruit (could be preventing you from losing those last few pounds or creating the vitality of your dreams)
-A simple to apply (but most often overlooked) alkaline diet system to help you
create a healthy lifestyle you enjoy
-Delicious alkaline juice recipes to stimulate healing,
natural weight loss
and vibrant energy
-Effective and
inexpensive alkaline superfoods
to achieve your health goals faster (most people overlook them)
-A not-so-difficult formula to
never struggle with motivation again
(to transform your body and feel amazing)
-What alkaline juicing can give you that raw foods or smoothies cannot (and how to create balance to never feel deprived again)
+ much, much more to empower you on your health journey!
What are you waiting for?
Order your copy today and quickly discover how Alkaline Juicing can transform your life!
description: "Plenty of recipes. I never would have thought to juice bell peppers, but I did and it's now a must add in all my juicing. Great book, I love keeping it out on the kitchen table to inspire me to juice daily." -  by Mouse, UK

With vibrant health, we feel more empowered and energized to pursue our goals and ambitions.', 'I am very passionate about writing self-care, wellness, mindfulness/meditation, and clean-food/nutritious recipe books for people who want to revolutionize their health and achieve a better quality of life through mindful decisions and balanced lifestyle choices.', 'Through my work, I want to help you take care not only of your body but also your mind and soul. I believe that all kinds of transformations are a life-long journey. So, I focus on progress, not perfection. I am here to show you simple step-by-step strategies which you can immediately implement to start feeling a positive difference and improved wellbeing.', "Aside from the recipes, I am also a big believer in mindset, self-motivation, and, most importantly - self-love and self-image. These are the driving forces on everyone's journey.", "My intention is not just to share recipes and information. It's not only about information. We also need motivation and inspiration to keep on track.", "Back in 2013, I decided to combine my background in several natural health/ self-care and wellness modalities (I'm certified in Holistic Nutrition, Reiki, aromatherapy and massage therapy) with my passion for writing/creating, and, most importantly, helping, coaching and motivating others - and this is how I became a wellness author. Through my books, I was given the opportunity to empower tens of thousands of readers across the globe.", 'That is the work I am blessed to be doing because I know that if I can help you transform, you can help those around you.', "Let's make this world a better, happier and healthier place!", '***', 'I am looking forward to connecting with you and helping you on your journey,', 'You deserve to enjoy balance, vibrant health and unstoppable energy.', "Once, again, I hope my work can inspire you on your wellness journey so that you can inspire and empower those around you. Yes, I'm a Cat Lady :)", 'I hope we will meet again,', 'With lots of love,', 'Marta "Wellness" Tuchowska (yea, I know, difficult surname to pronounce, I don\'t expect you to remember it either, haha, so just call me Marta Wellness!).']}
